title: Walking by Faith
speaker: Pastor John Smith
description: An encouraging message on trusting God in uncertain times, based on Hebrews 11.

title: The Power of Prayer
speaker: Elder Mary Johnson
description: A sermon reminding us of the importance of prayer in our daily walk with Christ.

title: Living as Witnesses
speaker: Pastor John Smith
description: Exploring Acts 1:8 and what it means to live as a witness for Jesus today.
